long_description: Dedicated climber Seth Robinson explores the classic bouldering around Las Vegas in brilliant full-color photographs. Author: Seth Robinson. Softcover; 112 pages; color photographs and maps. Wolverine Publishing, LLC; copyright 2008. Covers over 300 problems at Kraft Boulders, Calico Basin, Red Rocks Loop, Black Velvet Canyon, Mount Charleston and Big Sandy. Featuring well-laid-out descriptions, routes and photographs, this guidebook is exceptionally easy to follow. Overview maps chart the climbing area, and route-overlaid photographs guide you through each problem. Innovative graph presents the number and rating of each bouldering problem-glean at-a-glace impressions of the range of bouldering available at each area.
short_description: Dedicated climber Seth Robinson explores the classic bouldering around Las Vegas in brilliant full-color photographs.
